com.amazonaws.encryptionsdk.kms.AwsKmsMrkAwareMasterKey

Packages that use AwsKmsMrkAwareMasterKey
Package
Description
com.amazonaws.encryptionsdk.kms
Contains logic necessary to create MasterKeys backed by AWS KMS keys.
